parameters.name: AutoStartBackup
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable automatic backup.

- **true**: Enable.

- **false**: Disable.

parameters.name: BackupGatewayId
parameters.description:
The ID of the backup gateway. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

> This parameter is required if **SourceEndpointInstanceType** is set to **agent**.

parameters.name: BackupLogIntervalSeconds
parameters.description:
The interval for incremental backups, in seconds (s).

> This parameter is valid only for physical backups.

parameters.name: BackupObjects
parameters.description: The backup objects. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: BackupPeriod
parameters.description:
The full backup cycle. Valid values:

- **Monday**

- **Tuesday**

- **Wednesday**

- **Thursday**

- **Friday**

- **Saturday**

- **Sunday**

parameters.name: BackupPlanId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup plan. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: BackupPlanName
parameters.description: The custom name of the backup plan. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: BackupRateLimit
parameters.description:
The network bandwidth throttling limit, in KB/s. The maximum value is 10 GB.

> This parameter is valid only for physical backups of MySQL databases.

parameters.name: BackupRetentionPeriod
parameters.description: The retention period for backup data, in days. Valid values: 0 to 1825. Default value: 730.

parameters.name: BackupSpeedLimit
parameters.description:
The disk I/O limit, in KB/s.

> This parameter is valid only for physical backups of MySQL databases.

parameters.name: BackupStartTime
parameters.description: The start time for the full backup. The time is in the *HH:mm*Z format (UTC). Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: BackupStorageType
parameters.description:
The built-in storage type:

- Empty (default): Backup data is stored in your OSS bucket.

- system: Backup data is stored in the built-in OSS bucket of DBS.

parameters.name: BackupStrategyType
parameters.description:
The backup strategy. Valid values:

- **simple**: Periodic backup. Use this value with BackupPeriod and BackupStartTime.

- **manual**: Manual backup.

> Default value: **simple**.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A client token used to ensure the idempotence of the request. This prevents duplicate requests. The client generates this value, which must be unique among different requests. The value can be up to 64 ASCII characters and cannot contain non-ASCII characters.

parameters.name: CrossAliyunId
parameters.description: The UID of the Alibaba Cloud account for cross-account backup. Call the [DescribeRestoreTaskList](~~2869838~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: CrossRoleName
parameters.description: The name of the Resource Access Management (RAM) role for cross-account backup. Call the [DescribeRestoreTaskList](~~2869838~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: DuplicationArchivePeriod
parameters.description: The number of days after which a backup is converted to archive storage. Default value: 365.

parameters.name: DuplicationInfrequentAccessPeriod
parameters.description: The number of days after which a backup is converted to Infrequent Access (IA) storage. Default value: 180.

parameters.name: EnableBackupLog
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable incremental log backup. Valid values:

- **true**: Enable.

- **false**: Disable.

parameters.name: OSSBucketName
parameters.description:
The name of the Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket.

> The system automatically generates a new name by default.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointDatabaseName
parameters.description:
The name of the database. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

> This parameter is required if the database type is **PostgreSQL** or **MongoDB**.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointIP
parameters.description:
The database endpoint. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

> This parameter is required if **SourceEndpointInstanceType** is set to **express**, **agent**, or **other**.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointInstanceID
parameters.description:
The ID of the database instance. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

> This parameter is required if **SourceEndpoint**.**InstanceType** is set to **RDS**, **ECS**, **DDS**, or **Express**.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointInstanceType
parameters.description:
The type of the database source. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter. Valid values:

- **RDS**

- **ECS**

- **Express**: A database connected over a leased line, VPN Gateway, or Smart Access Gateway.

- **Agent**: A database connected over a backup gateway.

- **DDS**: ApsaraDB for MongoDB.

- **Other**: A database connected over an IP address and port.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointOracleSID
parameters.description:
The Oracle system ID (SID).

> This parameter is required if the database type is Oracle.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointPassword
parameters.description:
The password for the database account.

> This parameter is optional if the database type is Redis, or if **SourceEndpointInstanceType** is **agent** and the database type is **SQL Server**. Otherwise, this parameter is required.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointPort
parameters.description:
The database port. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

> This parameter is required if **SourceEndpoint**.**InstanceType** is set to **express**, **agent**, **other**, or **ECS**.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointRegion
parameters.description:
The region of the database. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

> This parameter is required if **SourceEndpointInstanceType** is set to RDS, ECS, DDS, Express, or Agent.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointUserName
parameters.description:
The database account.

> This parameter is optional if the database type is Redis, or if **SourceEndpointInstanceType** is **agent** and the database type is **SQL Server**. Otherwise, this parameter is required.
